    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
       int a = Integer.parseInt(txtCSC.getText());
        int b = Integer.parseInt(txtCSM.getText());
        if (b<a)
            return;
        int c = b-a;
        txtTSD.setText(c+"");
        if (c>300)
        {
            int d = c*4000; 
            txtTT.setText(d+"");
        }
        else
            if (c>200)
            {
                int d =c*2500;
                txtTT.setText(d+"");
            }
            else
                if (c>100)
                {
                    int d =c*2000;
                    txtTT.setText(d+"");
                }
                else
                   if (c>50)
                 {
                     int d = c*1000;
                     txtTT.setText(d+"");
                 }
                   else
                   {
                     int d = c* 500;
                     txtTT.setText(d+"");}
    }

     * @param args the command line arguments
